resources.string: Oops, We are fighting to fulfill.

AMS HONE consists of several Business Applications, Infrastructure Applications, Publications and ETL/XML applications running on Hone platform. Business Partners, Customers and IBM Sales from EMEA region use these applications for ordering configured products (i, p, z, and larger xSeries peripherals). Basically it connects Configurators to order fulfillment processing. It hosts about 40 applications used by 35.000 users worldwide.
IBMâ€™ers, Customers and Business Partners need access to the prices Of Hardware, Software and Services. Price applications can Be used to look up the list price Of single IBM items.
A Configuration(CFReport) can be Subm- Itted to the order submission system, which will send it to the fulfillment system.
